6087e2a5232e5a31c233d552.Description: The OPFOR AA47 stock from the Archangel kit for AKM/AK-74-type non-folding weapon systems. Manufactured by ProMag.

60c080eb991ac167ad1c3ad4.Name: MBT Integrated Navigation System
60c080eb991ac167ad1c3ad4.Description: The central control block of the GALS-DZ navigational complex for T-72 and T-90 tanks.

60b0f6c058e0b0481a09ad11.Name: WZ Wallet
60b0f6c058e0b0481a09ad11.Description: The "WillerZ" leather wallet. Same as any simple wallet, but fancier.

609a4b4fe2ff132951242d04.Name: VPO-102 Arbalet mount
609a4b4fe2ff132951242d04.Description: An aluminum mount for installing various sights and accessories on to the VPO-102 Vepr-Hunter carbine, manufactured by Arbalet.

60b0f561c4449e4cb624c1d7.Name: LVNDMARK's rat poison
60b0f561c4449e4cb624c1d7.Description: A special agent for the extermination of camper rats and small factory rodents. Contains the special CHAD formula.

60a3b5b05f84d429b732e934.Name: Medical record #2
60a3b5b05f84d429b732e934.Description: A journal with medical notes. The writing is barely readable, but it is of great value to certain third parties.

60a283193cb70855c43a381d.Name: NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armor
60a283193cb70855c43a381d.Description: The THOR full protection assault body armor equipped with soft and hard armor elements to protect against shrapnel and bullets of pistol and rifle calibers. Manufactured by NFM.

5fbc210bf24b94483f726481.Name: Bloc d'emprunt de gaz pour SIG MCX
5fbc210bf24b94483f726481.Description: Bloc d'emprunt de gaz conçu pour le SIG Sauer MCX.

5fbe3ffdf8b6a877a729ea82.Name: .300 AAC Blackout BPZ
5fbe3ffdf8b6a877a729ea82.Description: La cartouche de .300 AAC Blackout a été conçue par l'entreprise Advanced Armament Corporation (AAC) comme alternative au calibre 9x19 dans un MP5SD. Elle est conçue pour être utilisée dans les plateformes AR-15 et obtenir une balistique similaire aux cartouches supersoniques de 7,62x39 mm, en ayant également la possibilité de supporter des charges subsoniques tout en restant puissante, le tout en utilisant des chargeurs aux normes STANAG. Cette cartouche type FMJ peu onéreuse est produite par la fabrique de munitions Barnaul.

5fbbaa86f9986c4cff3fe5f6.Name: Crosse KRISS Defiance DS150
5fbbaa86f9986c4cff3fe5f6.Description: Crosse de remplacement pour carabines AR15/M16 produite par Magpul Original equipment. Se monte sur un tube de crosse aux normes mil-spec. Le profil de la crosse évite tout accrochage et protège le levier de déverrouillage pour éviter toute activation accidentelle, comprend une plaque de couche en caoutchouc de 0,76 centimètre d'épaisseur, antidérapante même avec des gilets tactiques ou autres équipements pare-balles.

5fbc226eca32ed67276c155d.Name: Garde-main SIG 8" KeyMod pour MCX
5fbc226eca32ed67276c155d.Description: Garde-main 8" pour SIG MCX, équipé d'une interface KeyMod pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

60339954d62c9b14ed777c06.Name: Pistolet-mitrailleur STM-9 Gen.2 9x19
60339954d62c9b14ed777c06.Description: Un carabine de compétition offrant d'excellentes performances dès la sortie de la boite. Conçu avec la participation du médaillé de bronze dans la catégorie carabine semi-automatique, Vadim Mikhailov. Elle allie précision, vitesse et confort de tir.

5fd4c5477a8d854fa0105061.Name: Gilet de sécurité
5fd4c5477a8d854fa0105061.Description: Un simple gilet porté par les services de sécurité.

5fbcc437d724d907e2077d5c.Name: Crosse fine et légère SIG Sauer pour MCX/MPX
5fbcc437d724d907e2077d5c.Description: Crosse fine et légère pour MCX/MPX produite par SIG Sauer.

5fc23636016cce60e8341b05.Description: Frein de bouche pour le calibre .338 Lapua Magnum développé par SilencerCo.

603373004e02ce1eaa358814.Description: Un canon pour STM-9 9x19 mm, 406 mm de long.

5fbcc429900b1d5091531dd7.Description: Une crosse télescopique pour MCX/MPX produite par SIG Sauer.

60b0f988c4449e4cb624c1da.Description: A special identification armband from Evasion, a local esports tournament by Sigma.

5fc23426900b1d5091531e15.Description: Chargeur 10 coups pour Mk-18, pour les cartouches de .338 Lapua Magnum.

5fbcbd6c187fea44d52eda14.Name: Poignée pistolet polymère pour SIG MCX
5fbcbd6c187fea44d52eda14.Description: Poignée pistolet en polymère pour SIG Sauer MCX.

602a95fe4e02ce1eaa358729.Name: Canon fileté pour PL-15
602a95fe4e02ce1eaa358729.Description: Canon fileté pour le pistolet PL-15.

6033fa48ffd42c541047f728.Description: Le EARMOR M32 est un casque antibruit électronique doté de moyens de communication, idéal pour un usage tactique.

5fc2369685fd526b824a5713.Name: Crosse B5 Precision
5fc2369685fd526b824a5713.Description: Crosse télescopique Precision produite par B5.

6034d2d697633951dc245ea6.Name: Sac à dos Eberlestock G2 Gunslinger II (dry earth)
6034d2d697633951dc245ea6.Description: Sac à dos militaire modulable de taille moyenne possédant des compartiments additionnels pour les armes longues.

6065881d1246154cad35d637.Name: AR-10 CMMG MK3 RML15 15 inch M-LOK handguard
6065881d1246154cad35d637.Description: A 15 inch handguard for AR-10 weapon systems, equipped with an M-LOK interface for attaching additional equipment. Manufactured by CMMG.

607d5aa50494a626335e12ed.Name: MP-155 walnut forestock
607d5aa50494a626335e12ed.Description: A Monte Carlo-style wooden walnut forestock for MP-155 shotguns. Manufactured by Izhmekh.

60a7ad3a0c5cb24b0134664a.Name: Tagilla's welding mask "Gorilla"
60a7ad3a0c5cb24b0134664a.Description: An armored steel welding mask of Tagilla - the Bossman of Factory. Painted with the special "Gorilla" art.

60a3c70cde5f453f634816a3.Name: CQC Osprey MK4A plate carrier (Assault, MTP)
60a3c70cde5f453f634816a3.Description: The Osprey plate carrier is actively used by the British army and specialists. The Assault preset is provided with heavy armor plates and a maximum of pouches for ammunition and grenades.

5f60c076f2bcbb675b00dac2.Name: Mandibule Ballistic Guard pour Caiman
5f60c076f2bcbb675b00dac2.Description: Protection pare-balles supplémentaire spéciale pour le casque Galvion Caiman, montée sur la fixation latérale.

5f4f9eb969cdc30ff33f09db.Name: Boussole portable professionnelle EYE MK.2
5f4f9eb969cdc30ff33f09db.Description: Boussole portable. Elle vous permet de naviguer rapidement en indiquant la direction des pôles magnétiques de la Terre. Grâce à elle, vous pouvez facilement déterminer les azimuts.

5fbcc3e4d6fa9c00c571bb58.Description: Boitier supérieur pour MCX de première génération produit par SIG Sauer. Équipé d'un rail Picatinny pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

5fb651b52b1b027b1f50bcff.Name: Chargeur Glock .45 ACP 13 coups
5fb651b52b1b027b1f50bcff.Description: Chargeur standard 13 coups .45 ACP pour Glock 21.

5fbcbd10ab884124df0cd563.Description: Le frein de bouche SIG two port peut être installé sur le système de montage breveté "Taper-LOK".

5fd4c4fa16cac650092f6771.Description: Gilet tactique artisanal fabriqué à partir de sacs de course IDEA. Il est impossible de dire s'il est fiable ou même convenable pour une large gamme d'applications militaires, mais au moins, c'est un bon exemple du style vestimentaire typé clodo.

5fc235db2770a0045c59c683.Name: Garde-main Sword int. 18" pour Mk-18
5fc235db2770a0045c59c683.Description: Garde-main Sword int. de 18 pouces pour Mk-18, équipé d'une interface M-LOK pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

5fc23678ab884124df0cd590.Name: Canon de 24" pour Mk-18 .338 Lapua Magnum
5fc23678ab884124df0cd590.Description: Un canon pour le Mk-18 et la munition .338 Lapua Magnum, 610 mm de long.

60098ad7c2240c0fe85c570a.Name: Kit de premiers secours tactique AFAK
60098ad7c2240c0fe85c570a.Description: AFAK (Adaptive First Aid Kit). Une version plus avancée du kit de premiers secours IFAK.

603648ff5a45383c122086ac.Name: Harnais tactique Azimut SS Jhuk (noir)
603648ff5a45383c122086ac.Description: Système de transport simple en nylon avec un système de pochettes non-amovibles. Il permet de transporter une quantité de munitions relativement impressionnante mais en dépit du confort.

601aa3d2b2bcb34913271e6d.Description: Cartouche de calibre 7,62x39 perforante possédant une balle à noyau en carbure de tungstène exposé.

6065dc8a132d4d12c81fd8e3.Name: CMMG Low Profile gas block
6065dc8a132d4d12c81fd8e3.Description: A low-profile gas block designed for AR-10 weapon systems and the Mk47 Mutant assault rifle. Manufactured by CMMG.

606587e18900dc2d9a55b65f.Name: CMMG buffer tube
606587e18900dc2d9a55b65f.Description: A Mil-Spec buffer tube for attaching various buttstocks. Manufactured by CMMG.

6040dd4ddcf9592f401632d2.Name: Harnais tactique Azimut SS Jhuk (SURPAT)
6040dd4ddcf9592f401632d2.Description: Système de transport simple en nylon avec un système de pochettes non-amovibles. Il permet de transporter une quantité de munitions relativement impressionnante mais en dépit du confort.

609269c3b0e443224b421cc1.Name: SilencerCo ASR 51T 5.56x45 flash hider
609269c3b0e443224b421cc1.Description: The SilencerCo ASR 5.56x45 flash hider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as a platform for attaching the SilencerCo Saker 556 sound suppressor. Can be Installed on AR-15 weapon systems.

6087e570b998180e9f76dc24.Name: Superfors DB 2020 Dead Blow Hammer
6087e570b998180e9f76dc24.Description: The hammer is coated with urethane which provides a "thud" using steel balls to cushion the impact and reduce the vibration recoil to the handle.

60a7acf20c5cb24b01346648.Name: BOSS cap
60a7acf20c5cb24b01346648.Description: A fancy red BOSS cap. Yo, fella, you da real BOSS now!

5f60cd6cf2bcbb675b00dac6.Name: Casque antibruit électronique Walker's XCEL 500BT
5f60cd6cf2bcbb675b00dac6.Description: Casque antibruit électronique avec un traitement électronique optimisé des sons ambiants sans distorsions superflues.

5f5e46b96bdad616ad46d613.Name: Sac à dos Eberlestock F4 Terminator (rayure tigre)
5f5e46b96bdad616ad46d613.Description: Sac à dos extrêmement versatile grand format pour une utilisation militaire.

5f633f791b231926f2329f13.Name: Frein de bouche JMAC RRD-4C pour filetage type AK-74
5f633f791b231926f2329f13.Description: Le frein de bouche RRD-4C par JMAC est conçu pour être installé sur les systèmes AK modernes. Il peut être utilisé pour les calibres 7,62, 5,45 ou 5,56. Il réduit le recul et le relèvement du canon.

5f2aa49f9b44de6b1b4e68d4.Name: Montage pour Kel-Tec RFB
5f2aa49f9b44de6b1b4e68d4.Description: Montage standard pour l'installation d'optiques sur le RFB, fabriqué par Kel-Tec.

5f2aa4464b50c14bcf07acdb.Name: Bague de protection du filetage pour RFB
5f2aa4464b50c14bcf07acdb.Description: Bague de protection de filetage pour canon de RFB.

5f647d9f8499b57dc40ddb93.Name: Chargeur tubulaire 23x75 mm 3 coups pour KS-23M
5f647d9f8499b57dc40ddb93.Description: Chargeur tubulaire de 3 cartouches 23x75 mm pour fusil KS-23M.

5fbcbcf593164a5b6278efb2.Name: Cache-flamme SIG 3-prong 7,62x51
5fbcbcf593164a5b6278efb2.Description: Le cache-flamme SIG 3-prong peut être installé sur le système de montage breveté "Taper-LOK".

5fc3e4a27283c4046c5814ab.Name: Canon de 8" pour UMP .45 ACP
5fc3e4a27283c4046c5814ab.Description: Un canon pour les UMP chambrés en .45 ACP, 200 mm de long.

5fc3f2d5900b1d5091531e57.Name: Pistolet-mitrailleur TDI Kriss Vector Gen.2 9x19
5fc3f2d5900b1d5091531e57.Description: Le pistolet-mitrailleur KRISS Vector est le choix idéal pour le personnel des forces de l'ordre et militaires recherchant un système d'arme contrôlable et compact pour les environnements en combat rapproché. L'axe bas du canon et le système d'atténuation du recul Super V permettent des tirs contrôlables en automatique ou lors de tirs semi-auto successifs.

5fb64bc92b1b027b1f50bcf2.Name: Pistolet-mitrailleur TDI KRISS Vector Gen.2 .45 ACP
5fb64bc92b1b027b1f50bcf2.Description: Le pistolet-mitrailleur KRISS Vector est le choix idéal pour le personnel des forces de l'ordre et militaires recherchant un système d'arme contrôlable et compact pour les environnements en combat rapproché. L'axe bas du canon et le système d'atténuation du recul Super V permettent des tirs contrôlables en automatique ou lors de tirs semi-auto successifs.

5fc5396e900b1d5091531e72.Name: Rail latéral pour HK UMP
5fc5396e900b1d5091531e72.Description: Rail latéral pour UMP permettant l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

60228a850ddce744014caf69.Name: Guidon réhaussé pour PL-15
60228a850ddce744014caf69.Description: Guidon réhaussé pour PL-15 conçu pour l'utilisation de la mire avec un réducteur de son.

6086b5731246154cad35d6c7.Name: SOK-12 Custom Guns Type-340 handguard
6086b5731246154cad35d6c7.Description: Type-340 is a lightweight aircraft grade aluminium handguard, designed for installation on Saiga carbines. Manufactured by Custom Guns.

606dae0ab0e443224b421bb7.Name: MP-155 12ga semi-automatic shotgun
606dae0ab0e443224b421bb7.Description: The Russian MP-155 smoothbore multi-shot 12 gauge shotgun, manufactured by IzhMekh ("Izhevsky Mechanical Plant"). The gun weighs less than its predecessor MP-153 and features enhanced ergonomics and an easy-to-replace barrel mechanism. The new design also makes it easier to use for left-handed users.

60658776f2cb2e02a42ace2b.Name: Mk47 254mm barrel
60658776f2cb2e02a42ace2b.Description: A 254mm long barrel for the CMMG Mk47 Mutant assault rifle, chambered in 7.62x39mm.

607ea812232e5a31c233d53c.Name: MP-155 Ultima short rail
607ea812232e5a31c233d53c.Description: The "Ultima" modification short rail for the MP-155 shotgun, which allows installation of additional equipment on the handguard. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

5f3e772a670e2a7b01739a52.Name: Queue de détente pour M45A1
5f3e772a670e2a7b01739a52.Description: Queue de détente d'origine pour M45A1, produite par Colt.

5f6341043ada5942720e2dc5.Name: Poignée pistolet Aeroknox scorpius pour AK
5f6341043ada5942720e2dc5.Description: Poignée pistolet légère pour AK, produite par Aeroknox.

5f63407e1b231926f2329f15.Name: Réducteur de son Rotor43 7,62x51 pour VPO-101
5f63407e1b231926f2329f15.Description: Le réducteur de son Rotor 43 s'installe sur les armes de la famille VPO chambrées en .308 (7,62x51). Bien qu'ayant le rôle d'un frein de bouche, il fonctionne aussi comme un réducteur de son.

5f6372e2865db925d54f3869.Name: Frein de bouche Ferfrans 5,56x45
5f6372e2865db925d54f3869.Description: Frein de bouche Ferfrans. Peut également être équipé du Ferfrans Modular Concussion Reduction Device.

5fca138c2a7b221b2852a5c6.Name: Antidote xTG-12
5fca138c2a7b221b2852a5c6.Description: Permet de contrer les effets de la plupart des poisons et toxines utilisés dans l'industrie du combat. Peut être utilisé pour soulager des effets des poisons naturels. Donne une immunité à l’empoisonnement tant que les principes actifs sont dans le système sanguin. Peut affecter la santé.

602e3f1254072b51b239f713.Name: Tube de crosse STM Arms
602e3f1254072b51b239f713.Description: Tube de crosse télescopique STM Arms 4 positions de diamètre Mil-Spec utilisable sur toutes les carabines de type AR-15.

60391b0fb847c71012789415.Name: Pain de TNT TP-200
60391b0fb847c71012789415.Description: Le TP-200 est conçu pour une utilisation dans les prises de donnée sismiques, comme détonateur intermédiaire pour les charges explosives de forage ainsi que l'éclatement d'objets de grandes tailles lors d'opérations de dynamitage.

6034e3e20ddce744014cb878.Name: Garde-main STM 12" M-LOK pour AR-15
6034e3e20ddce744014cb878.Description: Garde-main STM 12" pour AR-15 équipé d'une interface M-LOK pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

6086b5392535c57a13424d70.Name: Custom Guns handguard rail
6086b5392535c57a13424d70.Description: The Custom Guns rail guide allows you to install additional equipment on the proprietary handguards.

6076c1b9f2cb2e02a42acedc.Name: MP-155 510mm barrel
6076c1b9f2cb2e02a42acedc.Description: A standard serially produced 510mm barrel for MP-155 12 gauge shotguns.

60a272cc93ef783291411d8e.Name: Hazard 4 Drawbridge backpack (Coyote Tan)
60a272cc93ef783291411d8e.Description: Drawbridge is an ergonomical medium-size 25L backpack with an impressive amount of modular pouches and straps. Manufactured by Hazard 4.

60a23797a37c940de7062d02.Name: SIG Sauer ROMEO8T reflex sight
60a23797a37c940de7062d02.Description: The ROMEO8T reflex sight, designed for precision shooting for modern sporting rifles and shotguns. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

5f5f41f56760b4138443b352.Name: Gilet tactique compact Direct Action Thunderbolt
5f5f41f56760b4138443b352.Description: Gilet tactique Direct Action Thunderbolt, contenant toutes les pochettes de base dont vous avez besoin.

5f2aa493cd375f14e15eea72.Name: Rail pour garde-main Kel-Tec RFB
5f2aa493cd375f14e15eea72.Description: Rail long pour RFB, il vous permet d'installer des équipements et accessoires supplémentaires sur le garde-main.

5f60b34a41e30a4ab12a6947.Name: Casque balistique Galvion Caiman
5f60b34a41e30a4ab12a6947.Description: Le casque balistique Galvion Caiman est une nouvelle génération de casque léger destiné aux forces spéciales. Une série d’accessoires modulables améliore le casque, offrant à l'utilisateur un casque léger, confortable avec une protection maximale.

5fb651dc85f90547f674b6f4.Name: Chargeur Magex G30 .45 ACP 30 coups pour Glock
5fb651dc85f90547f674b6f4.Description: Chargeur Magex G30 .45 ACP 30 coups pour Glock.

5f60b85bbdb8e27dee3dc985.Name: Applique pare-balles pour Caiman Hybrid (noire)
5f60b85bbdb8e27dee3dc985.Description: Plaque de protection pare-balles additionnelle améliorant la protection contre les balles et les fragments du casque Caiman Hybrid.

5fbbc383d5cb881a7363194a.Name: Canon de 6" pour KRISS Vector 9x19
5fbbc383d5cb881a7363194a.Description: Canon fileté de 6 pouces pour vector 9x19, produit par KRISS.

5fb65424956329274326f316.Name: Cache-flamme .45 ACP pour KRISS Vector
5fb65424956329274326f316.Description: Cache-flamme standard .45 ACP pour KRISS Vector.

5fc0f9b5d724d907e2077d82.Name: Poignée tactique verticale MVF001 A3 KeyMod noire
5fc0f9b5d724d907e2077d82.Description: La poignée tactique verticale MVF001 A3 a été conçue spécifiquement pour l'interface KeyMod.

5fb65363d1409e5ca04b54f5.Name: Canon de 5" pour KRISS Vector .45 ACP
5fb65363d1409e5ca04b54f5.Description: Canon de 5" pour KRISS Vector .45 ACP.

602e63fb6335467b0c5ac94d.Name: Boitier supérieur STM-9 9x19
602e63fb6335467b0c5ac94d.Description: Boitier supérieur pour pistolet-mitrailleur STM-9. Équipé d'un rail Picatinny pour l'installation d'accessoires supplémentaires.

5fd8d28367cb5e077335170f.Name: Cagoule Smoke
5fd8d28367cb5e077335170f.Description: La cagoule du fameux artiste de Hip-Hop de Tarkov, Smoke.

6034e3cb0ddce744014cb870.Name: Garde-main STM 9" M-LOK pour AR-15
6034e3cb0ddce744014cb870.Description: Garde-main STM 9" pour AR-15 équipé d'une interface M-LOK pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

6065c6e7132d4d12c81fd8e1.Name: AR-10 CMMG SV Brake 7.62x51 muzzle brake
6065c6e7132d4d12c81fd8e1.Description: The CMMG SV Brake muzzle compensator is an effective single port brake designed specifically for .308 caliber AR-10 weapon systems. The large port presents a broad surface for gasses to impact against, which keeps the muzzle down and the sights on target.

609267a2bb3f46069c3e6c7d.Name: T-90M Commander Control Panel
609267a2bb3f46069c3e6c7d.Description: A tank commander control panel for controlling tank artillery. Allows the control of T-90M main cannon.

60a621c49c197e4e8c4455e6.Name: Stich Profi Chest Rig MK2 (Assault, A-TACS FG)
60a621c49c197e4e8c4455e6.Description: The "Chest-Rig" tactical system can be used as an independent piece of equipment or as an addition to body armor without the MOLLE system. Suitable for combat training instructors, special forces units. Assault preset in A-TACS FG camouflage. Manufactured by Stich Profi.

60b0f93284c20f0feb453da7.Name: Can of RatCola
60b0f93284c20f0feb453da7.Description: Limited edition RatCola from the General Sam brand. The secret recipe of this cola still remains a mystery.

5fc2360f900b1d5091531e19.Name: Bloc d'emprunt de gaz pour Mk-18
5fc2360f900b1d5091531e19.Description: Bloc d'emprunt de gaz pour Mk-18 conçu et produit par Sword International.

60391afc25aff57af81f7085.Name: Clé à cliquet
60391afc25aff57af81f7085.Description: Les clés à cliquet sont un outil indispensable que tout bon serrurier et mécanicien se doit d'avoir. Elles permettent de travailler dans des espaces confiné et possède un système pour changer rapidement la tête de la clé. Un outil précieux !

60785c0d232e5a31c233d51c.Name: MP-155 Ultima pistol grip rubber pad
60785c0d232e5a31c233d51c.Description: The "Ultima" modification ergonomical rubber pad for the MP-155 pistol grip. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

60a6220e953894617404b00a.Name: Stich Profi Chest Rig MK2 (Recon, A-TACS FG)
60a6220e953894617404b00a.Description: The "Chest-Rig" tactical system can be used as an independent piece of equipment or as an addition to body armor without the MOLLE system. Suitable for combat training instructors, special forces units. Recon preset in A-TACS FG camouflage. Manufactured by Stich Profi.

606f26752535c57a13424d22.Name: MP-155 Ultima underbarrel mount
606f26752535c57a13424d22.Description: The "Ultima" modification underbarrel mount for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

60a7ad2a2198820d95707a2e.Name: Tagilla's welding mask "UBEY"
60a7ad2a2198820d95707a2e.Description: An armored steel welding mask of Tagilla - the Bossman of Factory. Painted with the special "UBEY" ("KILL") art.

5fbcc1d9016cce60e8341ab3.Name: Fusil d'assaut SIG MCX .300 AAC Blackout
5fbcc1d9016cce60e8341ab3.Description: La gamme MCX conçue et produite par SIG Sauer est disponible aussi bien en version semi-automatique qu'en automatique et dispose d'un système d'emprunt de gaz à piston à course courte tiré de la gamme des pistolets-mitrailleurs MPX.

5fbbc34106bde7524f03cbe9.Name: Bague de protection de filetage 9x19 pour KRISS Vector
5fbbc34106bde7524f03cbe9.Description: Bague de protection de filetage pour les canons en 9x19 du KRISS Vector.

5fc382a9d724d907e2077dab.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum AP
5fc382a9d724d907e2077dab.Description: Cartouche à balle perforante (anti-blindage) de 239 grains (15,48 g).

5fbc227aa56d053a3543f79e.Name: Garde-main SIG 12" KeyMod pour MCX
5fbc227aa56d053a3543f79e.Description: Garde-main 12" pour SIG MCX, équipé d'une interface KeyMod pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

5fc4b992187fea44d52edaa9.Name: Adaptateur de filetage pour Silencerco Omega 45k
5fc4b992187fea44d52edaa9.Description: Adaptateur de filetage pour l'installation du réducteur de son Silencerco Omega 45k directement sur le filetage du canon.

5fc53954f8b6a877a729eaeb.Name: Rail inférieur pour HK UMP
5fc53954f8b6a877a729eaeb.Description: Rail inférieur pour UMP permettant l'installation de diverses poignées tactiques.

602a97060ddce744014caf6f.Name: Réducteur de son pour PL-15 9x19 mm
602a97060ddce744014caf6f.Description: Réducteur de son standard pour PL-15.

606587252535c57a13424cfd.Name: CMMG Mk47 Mutant 7.62x39 assault rifle
606587252535c57a13424cfd.Description: CMMG Mk47 Mutant, an American-made carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm, manufactured by CMMG Inc. Works with all types of AK magazines, including steel, polymer and drums. The carbine has shown exceptional reliability, which, together with the classic ergonomics of the AR system, gives an excellent example of a firearm. This variant features a fully automatic firing mode, for Law Enforcement and Millitary use only.

60785ce5132d4d12c81fd918.Name: MP-155 Ultima top rail
60785ce5132d4d12c81fd918.Description: The "Ultima" modification top tail for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

6034cf5fffd42c541047f72e.Name: Gilet de chasseur Umka М33-SET1
6034cf5fffd42c541047f72e.Description: Le gilet Umka M33-SET1 est conçu pour les chasseurs, voyageurs, professionnels de terrain et agents de sécurité.

609a63b6e2ff132951242d09.Name: Valday Krechet reflex sight
609a63b6e2ff132951242d09.Description: The Krechet reflex sight, designed for precision shooting at day and at night when used in combination with a night vision device. Manufactured by Valday.

609e8540d5c319764c2bc2e9.Name: NFM THOR Concealable Reinforced Vest body armor
609e8540d5c319764c2bc2e9.Description: The THOR Concealable Reinforced Vest enables the overt or covert carrying of soft ballistic panels providing 360 degrees protection against high-speed fragments and handgun ammunition. Adding hard ballistic plates enables protection against rifle ammunition for the vital organs. The ergonomic shape of the soft ballistic panels and the position of the back plate combined with the integrated lumbar support belt provides comfort and stability close to the body’s center of mass. Manufactured by NFM.

60a3c68c37ea821725773ef5.Name: CQC Osprey MK4A plate carrier (Protection, MTP)
60a3c68c37ea821725773ef5.Description: The Osprey plate carrier is actively used by the British army and specialists. The Protection preset is provided with heavy armor plates and the optimal number of pouches for ammunition, grenades and special equipment.

5f3e7897ddc4f03b010e204a.Name: Hausse Novak Lomount
5f3e7897ddc4f03b010e204a.Description: Hausse Lomount pour M45, produite par Novak.

5f633f68f5750b524b45f112.Name: Frein de bouche JMAC RRD-4C 7,62x39 pour filetage type AKM
5f633f68f5750b524b45f112.Description: Le frein de bouche RRD-4C par JMAC est conçu pour être installé sur les AK en 7,62x39 ou les systèmes d'arme basés sur l'AKM. Il réduit le recul et le relèvement du canon.

5fc3e272f8b6a877a729eac5.Name: Pistolet-mitrailleur HK UMP 45
5fc3e272f8b6a877a729eac5.Description: Pistolet mitrailleur conçu par l'entreprise allemande Heckler & Koch dans les années 90 comme une version plus légère et moins onéreuse du MP5. Cette version est conçue pour la cartouche de .45 ACP et possède une cadence de tir réduite à 600 coups par minute.

602f85fd9b513876d4338d9c.Name: Puits de chargeur standard pour STM-9
602f85fd9b513876d4338d9c.Description: Puits de chargeur standard pour STM-9.

5ef1b9f0c64c5d0dfc0571a1.Name: Adaptateur de crosse LEO gen 1 pour M590
5ef1b9f0c64c5d0dfc0571a1.Description: Le kit de conversion pour crosse télescopique Mesa Tactical remplace la crosse standard avec un adaptateur qui accepte les crosses rétractables et les poignées pistolets de type AR.

602e620f9b513876d4338d9a.Name: Crosse Fab Defence GL Core
602e620f9b513876d4338d9a.Description: Crosse télescopique conçue par Fab Defence.

5ef61964ec7f42238c31e0c1.Name: Frein de bouche Anarchy Outdoors .45 ACP
5ef61964ec7f42238c31e0c1.Description: Frein de bouche Anarchy Outdors pour M1911A1.

60926df0132d4d12c81fd9df.Name: SilencerCo Saker ASR 556 5.56x45 sound suppressor
60926df0132d4d12c81fd9df.Description: The Saker ASR 556 sound suppressor, designed for use with 5.56x45 caliber weapon systems. Can be installed on the ASR-compatible muzzle devices.

5f3e76d86cda304dcc634054.Name: Marteau pour M45A1
5f3e76d86cda304dcc634054.Description: Marteau d'origine pour M45A1, produit par Colt.

60b52e5bc7d8103275739d67.Name: Stich Profi Chimera boonie hat
60b52e5bc7d8103275739d67.Description: A boonie hat with artificial camouflage leaves, manufactured by Stich Profi.

5f2aa43ba9b91d26f20ae6d2.Name: Adaptateur pour RFB
5f2aa43ba9b91d26f20ae6d2.Description: Adaptateur pour le fusil d'assaut RFB, fabriqué par Kel-Tec. Il est nécessaire pour le montage d'accessoires sur la bouche du canon.

5f0596629e22f464da6bbdd9.Name: .366 TKM AP
5f0596629e22f464da6bbdd9.Description: Cartouche de calibre .366 TKM à balle perforante (anti-blindage).

5f36a0e5fbf956000b716b65.Name: Pistolet Colt M45A1 .45 ACP
5f36a0e5fbf956000b716b65.Description:
Le pistolet MEU(SOC), ("Marine Expeditionary Unit"; "Special Operations Capable") officiellement connu sous le nom de M45 MEUSOC est un pistolet semi-automatique chambré en .45 ACP à alimentation par chargeur et fonctionnant par inertie. C'est une variante du M1911 et l'arme secondaire de dotation des forces de reconnaissance des troupes Marines des États-Unis d'Amériques depuis 1985.
 
La version M45A1 apporte quelques changements au design original du M1911A1. L'un d'entre eux est le double ressort récupérateur qui amortie la force de recul de la cartouche de .45 ACP en abaissant la force maximal de l'impulsion du recul. Il possède également une mire 3 points au tritium luminescente, un canon national match de 5 pouces, une sécurité ambidextre, un rail Picatinny et une finition Cerakote couleur tan.

5f6331e097199b7db2128dc2.Name: Garde-main tactique X47 pour AK et armes compatibles
5f6331e097199b7db2128dc2.Description: Garde-main tactique en aluminium pour la famille des AK, conçu et produit par TDI. Équipé de multiples rails pour l'installation d'une grande variété d’accessoires.

5fb6567747ce63734e3fa1dc.Name: Guidon profil bas escamotable KRISS Defiance
5fb6567747ce63734e3fa1dc.Description: Guidon profil bas escamotable et détachable KRISS Defiance.

5fc64ea372b0dd78d51159dc.Name: Couteau de cultiste
5fc64ea372b0dd78d51159dc.Description: Un couteau d'une étrange forme comportant d'étranges symboles provenant d'un cultiste. Il est apparemment utilisé comme un couteau de rituel, mais n'est pas limité à cette utilisation. Il possède un design fait pour l'utilisation de substances toxiques, il ne vaut mieux pas toucher la lame.

5fd4c60f875c30179f5d04c2.Name: Gilet tactique Gear Craft GC-BSS-MK1
5fd4c60f875c30179f5d04c2.Description: Gilet tactique nouvelle génération, agencé pour les opérations de patrouille et les d'assauts.

5fbe7618d6fa9c00c571bb6c.Name: Réducteur de son SIG Sauer SRD 7,62x51
5fbe7618d6fa9c00c571bb6c.Description: Le SRD 7,62x51 est un réducteur de son en titane de grade 5.

60338ff388382f4fab3fd2c8.Name: Puit de chargeur gros pour STM-9
60338ff388382f4fab3fd2c8.Description: Puits de chargeur standard gris pour STM-9.

606587a88900dc2d9a55b659.Name: Mk47 Resolute 7.62x39 upper receiver
606587a88900dc2d9a55b659.Description: The Resolute upper receiver for Mk47 Mutant assault rifle, chambered in 7.62x39mm. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices. Manufactured by CMMG.

60194943740c5d77f6705eea.Name: 5,56x45 mm Mk 318 Mod 0 (SOST)
60194943740c5d77f6705eea.Description: Une cartouche spéciale conçue par l'United States Marine Corps. La balle possède une pointe ouverte ayant un nez en plomb et une basse en cuivre. Le plomb casse les obstacle tandis que le cuivre pénètre plus loin dans la cible.

601948682627df266209af05.Name: UVSR Taiga-1
601948682627df266209af05.Description: UVSR "Outil de mission de secours" Taiga-1. Un outil de survie extrêmement versatile. C'est une arme, une pelle, une hache et tout ce que vous pouvez imaginer. Il a été conçu et produit en URSS par divers agences.

60228924961b8d75ee233c32.Name: Culasse standard pour PL-15
60228924961b8d75ee233c32.Description: Culasse standard pour le pistolet PL-15.

606587d11246154cad35d635.Name: CMMG RipStock buttstock
606587d11246154cad35d635.Description: The RipStock minimalistic telescopic buttstock, engineered for lightning-fast deployment to the user's personal setting. Manufactured by CMMG.

606eef756d0bd7580617baf8.Name: MP-155 Ultima polymer stock
606eef756d0bd7580617baf8.Description: The "Ultima" modification polymer stock for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

60391a8b3364dc22b04d0ce5.Name: Pot de thermite
60391a8b3364dc22b04d0ce5.Description: Mélange incendiaire composé de poudre d'aluminium et d'oxyde de fer. Ces composant possèdent une très haute température de combustion et sont capable de bruler sans la présence d'oxygène. Cette réaction chimique génère une chaleur intense permettant d'atteindre une température de 2 200°C, et est presque impossible à éteindre.

6065880c132d4d12c81fd8da.Name: AR-10 CMMG MK3 RML9 9 inch M-LOK handguard
6065880c132d4d12c81fd8da.Description: A 9 inch handguard for AR-10 weapon systems, equipped with an M-LOK interface for attaching additional equipment. Manufactured by CMMG.

6038d614d10cbf667352dd44.Name: Sac bandoulière Hazard4 Takedown (multicam)
6038d614d10cbf667352dd44.Description: Sac à bandoulière conçu pour le transport des armes à canon long.

60bf74184a63fc79b60c57f6.Name: Bomber beanie
60bf74184a63fc79b60c57f6.Description: A heraldic symbol of urban vagabonds. You need to wear it correctly, otherwise, the magic properties of the beanie will cease to work.

60a2828e8689911a226117f9.Name: Hazard 4 Pillbox backpack
60a2828e8689911a226117f9.Description: A compact backpack for safe storage of fragile items, electronics and other valuables. Military modular webbing (MOLLE) is provided throughout on the sides, straps, and interior along with velcro panels to allow expansion with pouches, velcro i.d. patches, etc. Manufactured by Hazard 4.

5f3e778efcd9b651187d7201.Name: Plaquettes de crosse standards en polymère pour M45A1
5f3e778efcd9b651187d7201.Description: Plaquettes d'origine pour M45A1, produites par Colt.

5efb0d4f4bc50b58e81710f3.Name: .45 ACP Lasermatch FMJ
5efb0d4f4bc50b58e81710f3.Description: Cartouche de .45 ACP à balle traçante FMJ.

5efb0da7a29a85116f6ea05f.Name: 9x19 mm 7N31
5efb0da7a29a85116f6ea05f.Description: Cartouche d'arme de poing à balle perforante 7N31 (anti-blindage) conçue pour l'engagement d'infanterie utilisant des protections pare-balles, s'abritant derrière des obstacles légers ou des voitures.

5f3e77f59103d430b93f94c1.Name: Canon fileté pour M1911A1 .45 ACP
5f3e77f59103d430b93f94c1.Description: Canon fileté pour M1911A1 .45 ACP, produit par Colt.

5efdaf6de6a30218ed211a48.Name: Ophtalmoscope marqué
5efdaf6de6a30218ed211a48.Description: Appareil médical destiné à l'examen des yeux, marqué avec un ruban adhésif.

5ef35d2ac64c5d0dfc0571b0.Name: Marteau pour M1911A1
5ef35d2ac64c5d0dfc0571b0.Description: Marteau d'origine pour M1911A1, produit par Colt.

5f5e45cc5021ce62144be7aa.Name: Sac à dos LK 3F Transfer
5f5e45cc5021ce62144be7aa.Description: Un sac à dos simple et abordable par la société LolKek. Pas très solide ni confortable, mais il vous permettra quand même de transporter votre butin.

5f6336bbda967c74a42e9932.Name: Garde-main Lancer LCH-7 12,5" M-LOK pour AR-10
5f6336bbda967c74a42e9932.Description: Garde-main Lancer LCH-7 12,5" pour AR-10 équipé d'une interface M-LOK pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

5f63418ef5750b524b45f116.Name: Garde-main aluminium Bravo-18 pour SOK-12
5f63418ef5750b524b45f116.Description: Le Bravo-18 est une garde main léger en alliage d'aluminium aéronautique, conçu pour être installé sur les carabines Saiga.

5f2aa4559b44de6b1b4e68d1.Name: Cache-flamme standard 7,62x51 pour RFB
5f2aa4559b44de6b1b4e68d1.Description: Cache-flamme type "cage d'oiseau" pour RFB 7,62x51 , fabriqué par Kel-Tec.

5f745ee30acaeb0d490d8c5b.Name: Plectre Veritas
5f745ee30acaeb0d490d8c5b.Description: Plectre (plus communément appelé "médiator") haute qualité de 0,5 mm d'épaisseur avec le logo de Veritas.

5fc0fa957283c4046c58147e.Name: Hausse escamotable pour SIG MCX
5fc0fa957283c4046c58147e.Description: Hausse escamotable pour fusil AR se montant sur un rail Picatinny.

5fb655a72b1b027b1f50bd06.Name: Fixation sangle 1 point pour KRISS Vector
5fb655a72b1b027b1f50bd06.Description: Fixation permettant le montage d'une sangle 1 point sur le KRISS Vector.

5fc4b9b17283c4046c5814d7.Name: Réducteur de son SilencerCo Omega 45k .45 ACP
5fc4b9b17283c4046c5814d7.Description: Réducteur de son léger produit par SilencerCo.

5fbbfacda56d053a3543f799.Name: Canon de 229 mm pour MCX et armes .300 AAC Blackout compatibles
5fbbfacda56d053a3543f799.Description: Canon de calibre .300 AAC Blackout pour les armes basées sur la même plateforme que le SIG MCX , 229 mm de long.

60098af40accd37ef2175f27.Name: Tourniquet hémostatique CAT
60098af40accd37ef2175f27.Description: Le CAT (Combat Application Tourniquet) évite la perte de sang en bloquant l'hémorragie en applicant une pression sur le membre affecté. Il utilise un système d'auto-ajustement de la pression et une lanière résistante à l'étirement.

5f6340d3ca442212f4047eb2.Name: Poignée tactique TD aluminium type squelette
5f6340d3ca442212f4047eb2.Description: Poignée tactique type squelette en aluminium produite par Tactical Dynamics.

608c22a003292f4ba43f8a1a.Name: Medical record #1
608c22a003292f4ba43f8a1a.Description: A journal with medical notes. The writing is barely readable, but it is of great value to certain third parties.

606eef46232e5a31c233d500.Name: MP-155 Ultima pistol grip
606eef46232e5a31c233d500.Description: The "Ultima" modification pistol grip for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

60b0f7057897d47c5b04ab94.Name: Loot Lord plushie
60b0f7057897d47c5b04ab94.Description: The "Loot Lord" plush toy from a famous Tarkov resident - AquaFPS. A very rare collectible!

609b9e31506cf869cf3eaf41.Name: VOMZ Pilad TargetRing reflex sight
609b9e31506cf869cf3eaf41.Description:
Designed for hunting birds or small game, for sport shooting at stationary or fast-moving targets. Ideal for this purpose, it creates a contrasting circle on the target, giving the shooter an opportunity to make the pre-direction and not to lose speed.
It is mounted only on smoothbore (shotgun) weapons.

5fbe760793164a5b6278efc8.Name: Réducteur de son SIG Sauer SRD QD 7,62x51
5fbe760793164a5b6278efc8.Description: Le SRD 7,62x51 est un réducteur de son en titane de grade 5 utilisant un système à détachement rapide (Quick Detach) pour se monter sur l'arme.

5fc22d7c187fea44d52eda44.Name: Fusil de précision semi-automatique Mk-18 .338 Lapua Magnum
5fc22d7c187fea44d52eda44.Description: Le Mk-18 est un fusil de précision semi-automatique capable d'accomplir des tirs à des distances extrêmes. Il a été conçu pour tirer le plein potentiel des cartouches de .338 Lapua Magnum, .338 Norma Magnum et .300 Norma Magnum. Le système permet d'accomplir des tirs à des distances extrêmes dans une plateforme légère et mobile. En utilisant le système propriétaire d'emprunt de gaz à piston à course courte SWORD, le fusil est précis, fiable et robuste. Entièrement ambidextre, modulable et ergonomique, le Mk-18 est un excellent choix pour les chasseurs passionnés, les fervents de tir longue distance ainsi que les tireurs de compétition.

5fb6548dd1409e5ca04b54f9.Name: Bague de protection de filetage .45 ACP pour KRISS Vector
5fb6548dd1409e5ca04b54f9.Description: Bague de protection de filetage pour les canons en .45 ACP du KRISS Vector.

602a9740da11d6478d5a06dc.Name: Pistolet PL-15 9x19
602a9740da11d6478d5a06dc.Description: Un pistolet automatique Russe chambré en 9x19 mm, développé par une équipe de designers du groupe Kalashnikov concern sous la supervisions de Dmitry Lebedev pour les besoins des agences de forces de l'ordre russes.

603409c80ca681766b6a0fb2.Name: Lunettes balistiques NPP KlASS Condor
603409c80ca681766b6a0fb2.Description: Lunettes balistiques robustes possédant des verres résistants aux impacts.

606f263a8900dc2d9a55b68d.Name: MP-155 Ultima large recoil pad
606f263a8900dc2d9a55b68d.Description: The "Ultima" modification large rubber recoil butt-pad for the MP-155 shotgun. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

5fc382c1016cce60e8341b20.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum UPZ
5fc382c1016cce60e8341b20.Description: Cartouche de chasse produite par Ulyanovs Cartridge Works.

5fce16961f152d4312622bc9.Name: Crosse KRISS Defiance DS150 FDE
5fce16961f152d4312622bc9.Description: Crosse de remplacement pour carabines AR15/M16 comprenant un tube de crosse de qualité militaire. Le profil de la crosse évite tout accrochage et protège le levier de déverrouillage pour éviter toute activation accidentelle, comprend une plaque de couche en caoutchouc de 0,76 centimètre d'épaisseur, antidérapante même avec des gilets tactiques ou autres équipements pare-balles.

607f201b3c672b3b3a24a800.Name: Twitch Rivals 2021 balaclava
607f201b3c672b3b3a24a800.Description: A custom balaclava in Twitch Rivals colors.

602293f023506e50807090cb.Name: Hausse réhaussée pour PL-15
602293f023506e50807090cb.Description: Hausse réhaussée pour PL-15 conçu pour l'utilisation de la mire avec un réducteur de son.

60337f5dce399e10262255d1.Name: Frein de bouche 9x19 standard pour STM-9
60337f5dce399e10262255d1.Description: Frein de bouche 9x19 standard pour STM-9.

6034e3d953a60014f970617b.Name: Garde-main STM-9 15" M-LOK pour AR-15
6034e3d953a60014f970617b.Description: Garde-main STM 15" pour AR-15 équipé d'une interface M-LOK pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

609bab8b455afd752b2e6138.Name: Torrey Pines Logic T12W thermal reflex sight
609bab8b455afd752b2e6138.Description: A compact termal reflex sight with a low frequency. Manufactured by Torrey Pines Logic.

607f20859ee58b18e41ecd90.Name: PACA Soft Armor (Rivals Edition)
607f20859ee58b18e41ecd90.Description: A light but durable and reliable body armor protecting only the vital areas, fitted with class 2 (Russian GOST) armor plates. Twitch Rivals 2021 special edition.

60915994c49cf53e4772cc38.Name: Military documents #1
60915994c49cf53e4772cc38.Description: A folder with military notes and paper maps. An extremely valuable thing for foreign counterparties.

607ffb988900dc2d9a55b6e4.Name: AR-10 SureFire ProComp 7.62x51 muzzle brake
607ffb988900dc2d9a55b6e4.Description: The ProComp muzzle brake designed for installation on AR-10-type systems and compatibles. The muzzle brake greatly reduces both recoil impulse and muzzle rise so that the user's weapon tracks straight back to keep them on target for faster shot-to-shot recovery. Manufactured by SureFire.

6113c3586c780c1e710c90bc.Name: AR-15 F1 Firearms Skeletonized Style 1 pistol grip
6113c3586c780c1e710c90bc.Description: A lightweight ergonomical pistol grip for AR-15 weapon systems, manufactured by F1 Firearms.

601949593ae8f707c4608daa.Name: 5,56x45 mm SSA AP
601949593ae8f707c4608daa.Description: Une très rare cartouche perforante SSA conçue pour remplacer la M995. La balle contient du carbure de tungstène pour une pénétration maximale des cibles solides.

5fbbc366ca32ed67276c1557.Name: Canon de 5" pour KRISS Vector 9x19
5fbbc366ca32ed67276c1557.Description: Canon fileté de 5 pouces pour vector 9x19, produit par KRISS.

5fce0cf655375d18a253eff0.Name: Poignée tactique Magpul RVG FDE
5fce0cf655375d18a253eff0.Description: La poignée tactique verticale Magpul RVG (Rail Vertical Grip) est très répandue, simple, peu coûteuse et ergonomique.

60363c0c92ec1c31037959f5.Name: Masque à gaz GP-7
60363c0c92ec1c31037959f5.Description: Le masque à gaz civil GP-7 est un équipement de protection individuelle des voies respiratoires, des yeux et de la peau du visage.

60098b1705871270cd5352a1.Name: Ration d'eau d'urgence
60098b1705871270cd5352a1.Description: Eau potable pour une utilisation en cas d'urgence et autres circonstances urgentes où une ration d'eau est nécessaire, prête à être stockée pendant plusieurs années.

6076c87f232e5a31c233d50e.Name: MP-155 6-round magazine extension
6076c87f232e5a31c233d50e.Description: A 6-shell magazine extension tube for MP-155 12 gauge shotguns.

6065878ac9cf8012264142fd.Name: Mk47 409mm barrel
6065878ac9cf8012264142fd.Description: A 409mm long barrel for the CMMG Mk47 Mutant assault rifle, chambered in 7.62x39mm.

6113cc78d3a39d50044c065a.Name: AR-15 F1 Firearms Skeletonized Style 2 PC pistol grip
6113cc78d3a39d50044c065a.Description: A lightweight ergonomical pistol grip with finger grooves for AR-15 weapon systems, manufactured by F1 Firearms. Wrapped with paracord for maximum comfort and minimum hand slip.

6087e0336d0bd7580617bb7a.Name: AR-15 Unique-ARs Wing & Skull 12 inch handguard
6087e0336d0bd7580617bb7a.Description: The Wing & Skull 12 inch handguard for AR-15 weapon systems. Manufactured by Unique-ARs.

6087e663132d4d12c81fd96b.Name: AK Custom Arms AGS-74 PRO + Sniper Kit pistol grip
6087e663132d4d12c81fd96b.Description: A lightweight ergonomic pistol grip for AK series weapon systems, features the "Sniper Kit" palm shelf for user comfort and hand rest. Manufactured by Custom Arms.

606587bd6d0bd7580617bacc.Name: Mk47 ambidextrous charging handle
606587bd6d0bd7580617bacc.Description: A charging handle for the Mk47 Mutant assault rifle. Ambidextrous latches allow for easy operation no matter which hand you use to charge the weapon. Manufactured by CMMG.

6113cce3d92c473c770200c7.Name: AR-15 F1 Firearms Skeletonized Style 2 pistol grip
6113cce3d92c473c770200c7.Description: A lightweight ergonomical pistol grip with finger grooves for AR-15 weapon systems, manufactured by F1 Firearms.

6113d6c3290d254f5e6b27db.Name: BelOMO PK-AA reflex sight
6113d6c3290d254f5e6b27db.Description: The PK-AA reflex sight, designed to fit any AK-style model with a dovetail rail mount. Manufactured by BelOMO.

611a31ce5b7ffe001b4649d1.Name: MP-43-1C buttpad
611a31ce5b7ffe001b4649d1.Description: A standard-issue buttpad for MP-43 shotguns.

60dc519adf4c47305f6d410d.Name: MTs-255-12 cylinder
60dc519adf4c47305f6d410d.Description: A standard-issue cylinder for the MTs-255-12 revolver shotgun.

611a30addbdd8440277441dc.Name: MP-43 12ga 750mm barrel
611a30addbdd8440277441dc.Description: A 750mm long 12 gauge barrel for the MP-43 double-barrelled shotgun.

6123649463849f3d843da7c4.Name: MTs-255-12 beechwood forestock
6123649463849f3d843da7c4.Description: A standard-issue forestock for the MTs-255 shotgun, made out of beechwood.

614451b71e5874611e2c7ae5.Name: Bottle of Tarkovskaya vodka
614451b71e5874611e2c7ae5.Description: "Tarkov fire water". It is not recommended to consume it in general, alcohol is harmful and all that, but sometimes it is necessary to relax after the battle. No need to raid area 51 to see them aliens after all. Looks like one came from a batch from the warehouses labeled 1211.

612781056f3d944a17348d60.Name: MTs-255-12 wooden stock
612781056f3d944a17348d60.Description: A standard wooden stock for the MTs-255-12 shotgun, manufactured by TsKIB.

60db29ce99594040e04c4a27.Name: MTs-255-12 12ga shotgun
60db29ce99594040e04c4a27.Description: MTs-255-12 is a unique for Russian market 12 gauge revolver shotgun.

612368f58b401f4f51239b33.Name: МTs-255-12 12ga 755mm barrel with rib
612368f58b401f4f51239b33.Description: A standard factory produced 755mm barrel with a wide upper rib for МTs-255 12 gauge shotguns.

612e0cfc8004cc50514c2d9e.Name: AWC PSR 5.56x45 muzzle brake
612e0cfc8004cc50514c2d9e.Description: PSR is an effective muzzle brake manufactured by AWC Silencers for 5.56x45. Reduces recoil and counters the muzzle rise. The brake is threaded and compatible with AWC PSR THOR sound suppressors.

612e0d81290d254f5e6b291a.Name: AWC PSR .338 LM muzzle brake
612e0d81290d254f5e6b291a.Description: PSR is an effective muzzle brake manufactured by AWC Silencers for .338 LM (8.6x70). Reduces recoil and counters the muzzle rise. The brake is threaded and compatible with AWC PSR THOR sound suppressors.

612e0e04568c120fdd294258.Name: AWC PSR muzzle brake protector
612e0e04568c120fdd294258.Description: A thread protector for PSR muzzle brakes manufactured by AWC Silencers.

612e0d3767085e45ef14057f.Name: AWC PSR 7.62x51 muzzle brake
612e0d3767085e45ef14057f.Description: PSR is an effective muzzle brake manufactured by AWC Silencers for 7.62x51. Reduces recoil and counters the muzzle rise. The brake is threaded and compatible with AWC PSR THOR sound suppressors.

612e0e55a112697a4b3a66e7.Name: TAA ZK-23 5.56x45 muzzle brake
612e0e55a112697a4b3a66e7.Description: The ZK is single-chamber highly effective slant face muzzle brake manufactured by Tactical Advantage Armory. The front is rather pointy and doubles as a CQB threat deterrent and soft target weapon. Not recommended for situations where high concussion is a concern.

612e0e3c290d254f5e6b291d.Name: TAA ZK-38 7.62x51 muzzle brake
612e0e3c290d254f5e6b291d.Description: The ZK is single-chamber highly effective slant face muzzle brake manufactured by Tactical Advantage Armory. The front is rather pointy and doubles as a CQB threat deterrent and soft target weapon. Not recommended for situations where high concussion is a concern.

6176a40f0b8c0312ac75a3d3.Name: Ghoul mask
6176a40f0b8c0312ac75a3d3.Description: A rubber mask of a Ghoul. If you want to terrify Scavs and make them look for new pants, this mask is for you.

6176a48d732a664031271438.Name: Faceless mask
6176a48d732a664031271438.Description: A scary mask from some famous animated movie.

6130c3dffaa1272e43151c7d.Name: HK UMP .45 ACP 8 inch threaded barrel
6130c3dffaa1272e43151c7d.Description: A threaded barrel for the HK UMP submachine gun, chambered in .45 ACP ammo, 8 inches (203mm) long.

6130c43c67085e45ef1405a1.Name: KAC QDC 7.62x51 muzzle brake kit
6130c43c67085e45ef1405a1.Description: Knight's Armament Company Muzzle Brake Kit is an effective muzzle brake that also serves as a platform for attaching the PRS QDC sound suppressor. It can be Installed on AR-10 platform weapons.

6130c4d51cb55961fa0fd49f.Name: HK UMP B&T OEM .45 ACP sound suppressor
6130c4d51cb55961fa0fd49f.Description: A hard to find sound suppressor, designed for the HK UMP 45 submachine gun and utilizes a locking gate QD to allow for quick attachment and removal. Imported by H&K from Brugger & Thomet Switzerland.

6130ca3fd92c473c77020dbd.Name: AK CSS knurled charging handle
6130ca3fd92c473c77020dbd.Description: The CSS knurled charging handle gives the user an enhanced oversized knob to operate the weapon more easily. This handle works on all Vepr Rifles and Shotguns, Saiga Rifles and Shotguns, and most AK platform weapons.

615d8d878004cc50514c3233.Name: B&T QD NAR mount for Aimpoint ACRO
615d8d878004cc50514c3233.Description: The Brugger & Thomet QD NAR is a special mount for the Aimpoint ACRO-series reflex sights. 39mm stand height.

615d8da4d3a39d50044c10e8.Name: Glock TangoDown AAM-01 ACRO mount base
615d8da4d3a39d50044c10e8.Description: The TangoDown mount for installing the Aimpoint ACRO reflex sight on the Glock MOS pistol slide to increase the weapon's speed and proficiency.

615d8df08004cc50514c3236.Name: HK MP5 B&T QD Muzzle Brake
615d8df08004cc50514c3236.Description: A muzzle brake for MP5-based weapons with a quick-detach lever for easy removal and installation. Manufactured by Brugger & Thomet.

615d8dbd290d254f5e6b2ed6.Name: Glock 9x19 MOS slide
615d8dbd290d254f5e6b2ed6.Description: The MOS (Modular Optic System) slide designed for Glock 9x19 pistols. Manufactured by Glock.

615d8e9867085e45ef1409c6.Name: AK Kiba Arms .308 muzzle device adapter
615d8e9867085e45ef1409c6.Description: The Kiba Arms "Samson" adapter that allows to install various .308 (7.62x51) muzzle devices on 7.62x39 AK automatic rifles.

615d8e2f1cb55961fa0fd9a4.Name: BLITZ 5.56x45 flash hider
615d8e2f1cb55961fa0fd9a4.Description: A flash hider for use on AR-15 style platforms. The BLITZ compensator is one of the most effective designs available and a great upgrade for a stock AR-15.

615d8faecabb9b7ad90f4d5d.Name: AR-15 Tactical Dynamics Hexgrip pistol grip
615d8faecabb9b7ad90f4d5d.Description: The Hexgrip ergonomical pistol grip for the AR-15 platform weapon systems, manufactured by Tactical Dynamics.

615d8f5dd92c473c770212ef.Name: AK Hexagon "Reactor" 5.45x39 muzzle brake
615d8f5dd92c473c770212ef.Description: The "Reactor" muzzle brake manufactured by Hexagon for 5.45x39 AK platforms. Features mounts required for installation of the "Wafflemaker" sound suppressor.

615d8f8567085e45ef1409ca.Name: AK Hexagon "Wafflemaker" 5.45x39 sound suppressor
615d8f8567085e45ef1409ca.Description: The "Wafflemaker" sound suppressor manufactured by Hexagon, designed for installation on the Hexagon "Reactor" muzzle brake.

615d8eb350224f204c1da1cf.Name: AR-10 SureFire Warden 7.62x51 blast regulator
615d8eb350224f204c1da1cf.Description: The SureFire Warden blast regulator features a stainless steel body that enhances the overall appearance while protecting the inner parts from harm. This blast regulator prevents dirt, dust, debris, etc., from causing internal damage.

616442e4faa1272e43152193.Name: Aimpoint ACRO P-1 reflex sight
616442e4faa1272e43152193.Description: The compact ACRO P-1 reflex sight by Aimpoint was designed for use with special mounts. Lightweight, compact, and durable.

615d8fd3290d254f5e6b2edc.Name: Monstrum Tactical Vertical Fore Grip KeyMod
615d8fd3290d254f5e6b2edc.Description: A tactical foregrip manufactured by Monstrum Tactical. Compatible with KeyMod interface handguards.

616554fe50224f204c1da2aa.Name: Aimpoint Micro H-2 Standard Mount
616554fe50224f204c1da2aa.Description: Aimpoint Micro Standard Mount is a base mount for H-2 sights of the Micro series. Backwards-compatible with both T-1 and H-1 series reflex sights.

6165adcdd3a39d50044c120f.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 upper receiver
6165adcdd3a39d50044c120f.Description: An upper receiver for the SCAR-H assault rifle, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Features a top rail for installation of additional equipment.

61605d88ffa6e502ac5e7eeb.Name: Wilcox RAPTAR ES Tactical Rangefinder
61605d88ffa6e502ac5e7eeb.Description: The early generation of the tactical device called "RAPTAR" combined with a rangefinder. It has visible and IR lasers, as well as an infrared illuminator.

61657230d92c473c770213d7.Name: Aimpoint Micro H-2 reflex sight
61657230d92c473c770213d7.Description: The Micro H-2 compact reflex sight by Aimpoint was designed for use with any kind of firearms and even witn bows. Lightweight, compact, and durable.

6165aeedfaa1272e431521e3.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 upper receiver (FDE)
6165aeedfaa1272e431521e3.Description: An upper receiver for the SCAR-H assault rifle, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Features a top rail for installation of additional equipment. Flat Dark Earth version.

6165ac8c290d254f5e6b2f6c.Name: Leapers UTG reflex sight
6165ac8c290d254f5e6b2f6c.Description: The UTG reflex sight with a Red/Green сircle dot, manufactured by Leapers Inc. This model is a compact, small size reflex sight, which mounts on Weaver/Picatinny rails.

61659f79d92c473c770213ee.Name: Aimpoint PRO reflex sight
61659f79d92c473c770213ee.Description: The Aimpoint PRO (Patrol Rifle Optic) reflex sight is installed on the QRP2 or LRP mount that attaches to picatinny rails without any additional tools. The optic has flip-up lens covers – the solid front and transparent rear – allowing the user to shoot with the lens caps closed and both eyes open in an emergency situation. The PRO sight is fully compatible with all generations of night vision devices.

6165ac306ef05c2ce828ef74.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 assault rifle (FDE)
6165ac306ef05c2ce828ef74.Description: The FN SCAR-H (Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle - Heavy) assault rifle chambered in 7.62x51 NATO rounds, was adopted by the US SOCOM as the Mk 17. Features a side-folding polymer stock and a free-floating, cold hammer-forged Mil-Spec barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Flat Dark Earth version.

616584766ef05c2ce828ef57.Name: Aimpoint QRP2 mount for CompM4/PRO reflex sights
616584766ef05c2ce828ef57.Description: The QRP2 quick-detach base mount for the CompM4 and PRO series reflex sights, manufactured by Aimpoint.

61702d8a67085e45ef140b24.Name: HK417 extended charging handle
61702d8a67085e45ef140b24.Description: An extended charging handle for HK417 and compatible systems, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

61702be9faa1272e431522c3.Name: HK417 7.62x51 16.5 inch barrel
61702be9faa1272e431522c3.Description: A 16.5 inch (421mm) barrel for HK417-based weapons for 7.62x51 ammo.

61703001d92c473c77021497.Name: HK417 Extended Free Float handguard with flip up front sight
61703001d92c473c77021497.Description: The HK417 & G28 Extended DMR Forearm With a Flip Up Front Sight & Suppressor Window Cutout. Optimized design to mitigate the heat emissions for long range shooting and to prevent the mirage effect.

61702f1b67085e45ef140b26.Name: HK417 low profile gas block
61702f1b67085e45ef140b26.Description: A standard gas block for HK417 assault rifles and compatibles, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6171367e1cb55961fa0fdb36.Name: HK G28 B&T QD 7.62x51 sound suppressor
6171367e1cb55961fa0fdb36.Description: A quick-detach 7.62x51 silencer manufactured by Brugger & Thomet. Fits the HK Prolonged flash hider.

61695095d92c473c7702147a.Name: SKS 7.62x39 KCI 75-round drum magazine
61695095d92c473c7702147a.Description: The KCI 75-round blued steel magazine is designed for use with the SKS carbines that accept external magazines. Two exterior latches open the rear of the drum, allowing the user to reload without fighting spring tension and store the drum long-term with zero tension on the spring.

617131a4568c120fdd29482d.Name: HK417/G28 7.62x51 20-round magazine
617131a4568c120fdd29482d.Description: A 20-round, double stack HK417/G28 magazine for 7.62x51 ammunition. The floor plate can easily be removed for disassembly and cleaning.

617130016c780c1e710c9a24.Name: HK417/G28 7.62x51 10-round magazine
617130016c780c1e710c9a24.Description: A 10-round, double stack HK417/G28 magazine for 7.62x51 ammunition. The floor plate can easily be removed for disassembly and cleaning.

61713308d92c473c770214a0.Name: HK Prolonged 7.62x51 flash hider
61713308d92c473c770214a0.Description: The Heckler & Koch "Prolonged" 7.62x51 flash hider. Effectively suppresses flash and can also serve as a platform for the B&T QD sound suppressor.

61712eae6c780c1e710c9a1d.Name: HK417 Patrol handguard with flip up front sight
61712eae6c780c1e710c9a1d.Description: The HK417 & G28 DMR Forearm With a Flip Up Front Sight & Suppressor Window Cutout. Optimized design to mitigate the heat emissions for long range shooting and to prevent the mirage effect.

61713cc4d8e3106d9806c109.Name: Recknagel Era-Tac 34mm ring scope mount
61713cc4d8e3106d9806c109.Description: The Recknagel Era-Tac is a versatile base for mounting 34mm riflescopes. Equipped with additional top mounts for installation of various tactical equipment.

61714eec290d254f5e6b2ffc.Name: Schmidt & Bender PM II 3-12x50 scope
61714eec290d254f5e6b2ffc.Description: The Schmidt & Bender PM II 3-12x50 riflescope was originally created for elite military forces for high-quality target acquisition and pinpoint accuracy. The scope is outfitted with an illuminate Tremor2 reticle that offers a variety of markings to calculate precise shots while taking distance and windage into account.

61715e7e67085e45ef140b33.Name: HK Adjustable Buttstock cheek
61715e7e67085e45ef140b33.Description: The HK adjustable stock cheek piece provides optimum versatility in use.

61713a8fd92c473c770214a4.Name: HK G28 7.62x51 upper receiver
61713a8fd92c473c770214a4.Description: An upper receiver for the G28 marksman rifle manufactured by Heckler & Koch. Equipped with a top mount for attaching additional devices.

617155ee50224f204c1da3cd.Name: HK Adjustable Buttstock
617155ee50224f204c1da3cd.Description: An adjustable stock designed and manufactured by Heckler & Koch. This stock is fully adjustable for length of pull as well as the cheek height. Features a mount for installation of a cheek rest.

61714b2467085e45ef140b2c.Name: Recknagel Era-Tac Sunshade mount for Aimpoint T-1
61714b2467085e45ef140b2c.Description: The Recknagel Era-Tac Sunshade mount for the Aimpoint Micro T-1 reflex sight.

6176aca650224f204c1da3fb.Name: HK G28 7.62x51 marksman rifle
6176aca650224f204c1da3fb.Description: The HK G28 rifle was developed by Heckler & Koch specifically for the Bundeswehr as a support weapon for small infantry units. The G28 is based on the HK MR308, which, in turn, is a civilian version of the HK 417 automatic rifle. Despite several differences, the HK G28 is 75% interchangeable with the HK 417. This rifle is designed to shoot at distances inaccessible to standard 5.56mm assault rifles.

6171407e50224f204c1da3c5.Name: Recknagel Era-Tac 30mm ring scope mount
6171407e50224f204c1da3c5.Description: The Recknagel Era-Tac is a versatile base for mounting 30mm riflescopes. Equipped with additional top mounts for installation of various tactical equipment.

617154aa1cb55961fa0fdb3b.Name: HK417 E2 buttstock
617154aa1cb55961fa0fdb3b.Description: The E2 telescopic stock is designed as a replacement for standard HK417 stocks. Made of high-grade nylon fiber with a twist-off rubber butt pad and an ambidextrous sling attachment point. Can be installed on HK417/G28 weapon system buffer tubes. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

617153016c780c1e710c9a2f.Name: HK G28 buffer tube
617153016c780c1e710c9a2f.Description: A receiver extension buffer tube for installation of Mil-Spec buttstocks, fits both HK417 and G28.

617151c1d92c473c770214ab.Name: Schmidt & Bender PM II 1-8x24 scope
617151c1d92c473c770214ab.Description: The Schmidt & Bender PM II 1-8x24 riflescope was originally created for elite military forces for high-quality target acquisition and pinpoint accuracy. The scope is outfitted with an illuminate Tremor2 reticle that offers a variety of markings to calculate precise shots while taking distance and windage into account.

61605e13ffa6e502ac5e7eef.Name: Vortex Ranger 1500 rangefinder
61605e13ffa6e502ac5e7eef.Description: A handheld optical device that allows you to measure the distance to targets. Manufactured by Vortex Optics.

617aa4dd8166f034d57de9c5.Name: M18 smoke grenade (green)
617aa4dd8166f034d57de9c5.Description: The M18 smoke grenade made in the USA. Used in the US Army since the Second World War. The smoke is green-colored.

617fd91e5539a84ec44ce155.Name: RGN hand grenade
617fd91e5539a84ec44ce155.Description: RGN (Ruchnaya Granata Nastupatel'naya - "Offensive Hand Grenade") is an offensive anti-personnel fragmentation hand grenade of impact action.

618168b350224f204c1da4d8.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 13 inch barrel
618168b350224f204c1da4d8.Description: A 13 inches long (330mm) barrel for the SCAR-series weapons chambered in 7.62x51 NATO ammo.

61816df1d3a39d50044c139e.Name: FN SCAR bottom rail
61816df1d3a39d50044c139e.Description: A bottom rail for the SCAR-series handguards that allows installation of tactical foregrips or other devices.

61816734d8e3106d9806c1f3.Name: FN SCAR folding polymer stock
61816734d8e3106d9806c1f3.Description: A folding polymer stock for the SCAR-series rifles, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

61816dfa6ef05c2ce828f1ad.Name: FN SCAR side rail
61816dfa6ef05c2ce828f1ad.Description: A side rail for the SCAR-series handguards that allows installation of additional tactical equipment.

618167441cb55961fa0fdc71.Name: FN SCAR cheek rest
618167441cb55961fa0fdc71.Description: A standard cheek rest that is installed on top of the FN SCAR polymer stock. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

61816fcad92c473c770215cc.Name: FN SCAR front flip-up sight
61816fcad92c473c770215cc.Description: A removable flip-up front sight for the SCAR-series assault rifles, installed on the gas block. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

618167528004cc50514c34f9.Name: FN SCAR retractable polymer stock
618167528004cc50514c34f9.Description: A retractable polymer stock for the SCAR-series assault rifles, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

618168dc8004cc50514c34fc.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 20-round magazine
618168dc8004cc50514c34fc.Description: A 20-round magazine for the FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 battle rifle.

618167616ef05c2ce828f1a8.Name: FN SCAR rubber buttpad
618167616ef05c2ce828f1a8.Description: A rubber buttpad for the SCAR-series assault rifle polymer stocks, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

6181688c6c780c1e710c9b04.Name: FN SCAR charging handle
6181688c6c780c1e710c9b04.Description: A standard-issue charging handle for the SCAR-series assault rifles, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

618178aa1cb55961fa0fdc80.Name: AAC SCAR-SD 51T 7.62x51 flash hider
618178aa1cb55961fa0fdc80.Description: The Advanced Armament Corporation (AAC) SCAR-SD 51T flash hider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as an attachment platform for the AAC 762-SDN-6 sound suppressor. Can be installed on AR-15/AR-10-based rifles.

61825d136ef05c2ce828f1cc.Name: FN SCAR retractable polymer stock (FDE)
61825d136ef05c2ce828f1cc.Description: A retractable polymer stock for the SCAR-series assault rifles, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Flat Dark Earth version.

61825d06d92c473c770215de.Name: FN SCAR folding polymer stock (FDE)
61825d06d92c473c770215de.Description: A folding polymer stock for the SCAR-series rifles, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Flat Dark Earth version.

61817865d3a39d50044c13a4.Name: FN SCAR rear flip-up sight
61817865d3a39d50044c13a4.Description: A removable flip-up rear sight for the SCAR-series assault rifles. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

6183afd850224f204c1da514.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 assault rifle
6183afd850224f204c1da514.Description: The FN SCAR-H (Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle - Heavy) assault rifle chambered in 7.62x51 NATO rounds, was adopted by the US SOCOM as the Mk 17. Features a side-folding polymer stock and a free-floating, cold hammer-forged Mil-Spec barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

6183b0711cb55961fa0fdcad.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 16 inch barrel
6183b0711cb55961fa0fdcad.Description: A 16 inches long (406mm) barrel for the SCAR-series weapons chambered in 7.62x51 NATO ammo.

61825d24d3a39d50044c13af.Name: FN SCAR cheek rest (FDE)
61825d24d3a39d50044c13af.Description: A standard cheek rest that is installed on top of the FN SCAR polymer stock. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Flat Dark Earth version.

6183b084a112697a4b3a6e6c.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 20 inch barrel
6183b084a112697a4b3a6e6c.Description: A 20 inches long (508mm) barrel for the SCAR-series weapons chambered in 7.62x51 NATO ammo.

6183d53f1cb55961fa0fdcda.Name: FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 20-round magazine (FDE)
6183d53f1cb55961fa0fdcda.Description: A 20-round magazine for the FN SCAR-H 7.62x51 battle rifle. Flat Dark Earth version.

6183fd9e8004cc50514c358f.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 18 inch barrel
6183fd9e8004cc50514c358f.Description: An 18 inches long (457mm) LB barrel for the SCAR-series weapons chambered in 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

6183fd911cb55961fa0fdce9.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 14 inch barrel
6183fd911cb55961fa0fdce9.Description: A 14 inches long (355mm) STD barrel for the SCAR-series weapons chambered in 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

6183fc15d3a39d50044c13e9.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 10 inch barrel
6183fc15d3a39d50044c13e9.Description: A 10 inches long (254mm) CQB barrel for the SCAR-series weapons chambered in 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

6184055050224f204c1da540.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 assault rifle
6184055050224f204c1da540.Description: The FN SCAR-L (Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle - Light) assault rifle chambered in 5.56x45 NATO rounds, was adopted by the US SOCOM as the Mk 16. Features a side-folding polymer stock and a free-floating, cold hammer-forged Mil-Spec barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

618405198004cc50514c3594.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 upper receiver
618405198004cc50514c3594.Description: An upper receiver for the SCAR-L assault rifle, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Features a top rail for installation of additional equipment.

618407a850224f204c1da549.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 flash hider
618407a850224f204c1da549.Description: A 3-prong flash hider designed specifically for the SCAR-series 5.56x45 assault rifles. Can be equiped with a proprietary suppressor. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.

61840d85568c120fdd2962a5.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 30-round magazine (FDE)
61840d85568c120fdd2962a5.Description: A 30-round 5.56x45 metal magazine designed for the SCAR-series weapons. Flat Dark Earth version.

618a75f0bd321d49084cd399.Name: NPZ 1P78-1 2.8x scope
618a75f0bd321d49084cd399.Description: A 2.8x magnification day scope, installed on dovetail rails. Manufactured by NPZ.

61840bedd92c473c77021635.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 30-round magazine
61840bedd92c473c77021635.Description: A 30-round 5.56x45 metal magazine designed for the SCAR-series weapons.

618428466ef05c2ce828f218.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 assault rifle (FDE)
618428466ef05c2ce828f218.Description: The FN SCAR-L (Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle - Light) assault rifle chambered in 5.56x45 NATO rounds, was adopted by the US SOCOM as the Mk 16. Features a side-folding polymer stock and a free-floating, cold hammer-forged Mil-Spec barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Flat Dark Earth version.

618426d96c780c1e710c9b9f.Name: FN SCAR-L 5.56x45 upper receiver (FDE)
618426d96c780c1e710c9b9f.Description: An upper receiver for the SCAR-L assault rifle, manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal. Features a top rail for installation of additional equipment. Flat Dark Earth version.

618ba27d9008e4636a67f61d.Name: Vortex Razor HD Gen.2 1-6x24 riflescope
618ba27d9008e4636a67f61d.Description: A tactical riflescope designed for quick target acquisition and maximum precision. Manufactured by Vortex Optics.

618a75c9a3884f56c957ca1b.Name: NPZ 1P78-1 dovetail mount
618a75c9a3884f56c957ca1b.Description: An aluminum sight mount manufactured by NPZ for the installation of scopes and accessories. Installed on dovetail rails.

618b9671d14d6d5ab879c5ea.Name: Geissele Super Precision top ring cap
618b9671d14d6d5ab879c5ea.Description: A regular top ring cap for the Geissele Super Precision mounts.

618a5d5852ecee1505530b2a.Name: NPZ PK1 "Obzor" reflex sight
618a5d5852ecee1505530b2a.Description: A reflex sight designed for hunters for fast acquisition of the target while operating in highly cold temperatures, installed on dovetail rails. Manufactured by NPZ.

618a431df1eb8e24b8741deb.Name: RGO hand grenade
618a431df1eb8e24b8741deb.Description: RGO (Ruchnaya Granata Oboronitel'naya - "Defensive Hand Grenade") is a defensive anti-personnel fragmentation hand grenade of impact action.

618b9682a3884f56c957ca78.Name: Reptilia ROF-90 RMR mount for Geissele scope mounts
618b9682a3884f56c957ca78.Description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Geissele scope mount series. Replaces the standard Geissele top ring caps.

618b9643526131765025ab35.Name: Geissele Super Precision 30mm ring scope mount
618b9643526131765025ab35.Description: A universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Geissele.

618a760e526131765025aae3.Name: NPZ 1P78 scope eyecup
618a760e526131765025aae3.Description: A rubber eyecup for the NPZ 1P78 scope.

618bab21526131765025ab3f.Name: Geissele Super Precision 30mm ring scope mount (DDC)
618bab21526131765025ab3f.Description: A universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Geissele. Desert Dirt Color version.

618ba92152ecee1505530bd3.Name: Reptilia ROF-90 RMR mount for Geissele scope mounts (DDC)
618ba92152ecee1505530bd3.Description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Geissele scope mount series. Replaces the standard Geissele top ring caps. Desert Dirt Color version.

618ba91477b82356f91ae0e8.Name: Geissele Super Precision top ring cap (DDC)
618ba91477b82356f91ae0e8.Description: A regular top ring cap for the Geissele Super Precision mounts. Desert Dirt Color version.

6193d338de3cdf1d2614a6fc.Name: HK USP .45 ACP 12-round magazine
6193d338de3cdf1d2614a6fc.Description: A standard-issue 12-round .45 ACP magazine for the USP45 pistol.

619268ad78f4fa33f173dbe5.Name: Pumping station operation report
619268ad78f4fa33f173dbe5.Description: A document containing operational reports of the pumping station at the water treatment plant.

619268de2be33f2604340159.Name: Water pump operation data
619268de2be33f2604340159.Description: A document containing data about water pumps at the water treatment plant.

6193d382ed0429009f543e65.Name: HK USP .45 ACP pistol slide
6193d382ed0429009f543e65.Description: A standard-issue slide for the USP45 pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6193d3149fb0c665d5490e32.Name: HK USP Tactical .45 ACP 12-round magazine
6193d3149fb0c665d5490e32.Description: A 12-round .45 ACP magazine for the special version of the USP45 pistol - USP45 Tactical.

619386379fb0c665d5490dbe.Name: HK Sturmgriff foregrip
619386379fb0c665d5490dbe.Description: The Sturmgriff vertical foregrip. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

619252352be33f26043400a7.Name: Laptop with information
619252352be33f26043400a7.Description: A laptop in a special protected case. Used by military and private companies in the face of increased danger of damage to the device.

6193d3cded0429009f543e6a.Name: HK USP trigger
6193d3cded0429009f543e6a.Description: A standard-issue trigger for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6193a720f8ee7e52e42109ed.Name: HK USP .45 ACP pistol
6193a720f8ee7e52e42109ed.Description: The HK USP (Universelle Selbstladepistole - "Universal Self-loading Pistol") pistol is a further replacement of the HK P7 series pistols. Internationally accepted as an accurate and ultra-reliable handgun. Using a modified Browning-type action with a special patented recoil reduction system, the USP recoil reduction system reduces recoil effects on pistol components and also lowers the recoil forces felt by the shooter. This particular variant is chambered in .45 ACP. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

619256e5f8af2c1a4e1f5d92.Name: Model 7290 Flash Bang grenade
619256e5f8af2c1a4e1f5d92.Description: Model 7290 is a standard distracting explosive device. Produces 175 dB and a powerful light flash.

6193d3be7c6c7b169525f0da.Name: HK USP hammer
6193d3be7c6c7b169525f0da.Description: A standard-issue hammer for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6193dcd0f8ee7e52e4210a28.Name: AR-15 HK Battle Grip Beavertail pistol grip (RAL-8000)
6193dcd0f8ee7e52e4210a28.Description: The HK Battle Grip pistol grip with Beavertail can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. RAL-8000 color version.

6194efe07c6c7b169525f11b.Name: HK USP Tactical .45 ACP threaded barrel
6194efe07c6c7b169525f11b.Description: A 129mm threaded barrel for the special version of the USP pistol - USP Tactical, chambered in .45 ACP. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

619cbf9e0a7c3a1a2731940a.Name: Keycard holder case
619cbf9e0a7c3a1a2731940a.Description: A special small case for storing plastic cards, including key cards.

6193d5d4f8ee7e52e4210a1b.Name: HK USP slide lock
6193d5d4f8ee7e52e4210a1b.Description: A standard-issue slide lock lever for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194ef39de3cdf1d2614a768.Name: HK USP .45 ACP standard barrel
6194ef39de3cdf1d2614a768.Description: A standard-issue 112mm .45 ACP barrel for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f02d9bb3d20b0946d2f0.Name: HK USP Match .45 ACP barrel
6194f02d9bb3d20b0946d2f0.Description: A 153mm barrel for the special version of the USP pistol - USP Match, chambered in .45 ACP. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f41f9fb0c665d5490e75.Name: HK USP Tactical .45 ACP pistol slide
6194f41f9fb0c665d5490e75.Description: A pistol slide for the special version of the USP45 pistol - USP45 Tactical, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194eff92d2c397d6600348b.Name: HK USP Expert .45 ACP barrel
6194eff92d2c397d6600348b.Description: A 132mm barrel for the special version of the USP pistol - USP Expert, chambered in .45 ACP. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f1f918a3974e5e7421e4.Name: HK USP Tactical thread protector
6194f1f918a3974e5e7421e4.Description: A thread protector for the Tactical barrel for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f2912d2c397d6600348d.Name: HK USP rear sight
6194f2912d2c397d6600348d.Description: A standard-issue rear sight for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f017ed0429009f543eaa.Name: HK USP Elite .45 ACP barrel
6194f017ed0429009f543eaa.Description: A 153mm barrel for the special version of the USP pistol - USP Elite, chambered in .45 ACP. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f5722d2c397d6600348f.Name: HK USP Expert .45 ACP pistol slide
6194f5722d2c397d6600348f.Description: A pistol slide for the special version of the USP45 pistol - USP45 Expert, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f3286db0f2477964e67d.Name: HK USP Tactical front sight
6194f3286db0f2477964e67d.Description: A front sight for the special version of the USP pistol - USP Tactical. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f5a318a3974e5e7421eb.Name: HK USP Match .45 ACP pistol slide
6194f5a318a3974e5e7421eb.Description: A pistol slide for the special version of the USP45 pistol - USP45 Match, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

619621a4de3cdf1d2614a7a7.Name: HK USP .45 ACP Elite compensator
619621a4de3cdf1d2614a7a7.Description: The Elite compensator from the special USP Elite pistol kit will add additional weight to the front of your gun assisting to reduce vertical recoil "bounce". Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f5d418a3974e5e7421ef.Name: HK USP Elite .45 ACP pistol slide
6194f5d418a3974e5e7421ef.Description: A pistol slide for the special version of the USP45 pistol - USP45 Elite, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f2df645b5d229654ad77.Name: HK USP Tactical rear sight
6194f2df645b5d229654ad77.Description: A rear sight for the special version of the USP pistol - USP Tactical. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6194f35c18a3974e5e7421e6.Name: HK USP front sight
6194f35c18a3974e5e7421e6.Description: A standard-issue front sight for the USP pistol, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

619624b26db0f2477964e6b0.Name: HK USP .45 ACP Match compensator
619624b26db0f2477964e6b0.Description: The Match compensator from the special USP Match pistol kit will add additional weight to the front of your gun assisting to reduce vertical recoil "bounce". Features a mount for installation of additional tactical equipment. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6196255558ef8c428c287d1c.Name: HK USP rail adapter
6196255558ef8c428c287d1c.Description: An adapter for the USP pistol that allows the installation of additional tactical equipment. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

6196365d58ef8c428c287da1.Name: .300 Blackout Whisper
6196365d58ef8c428c287da1.Description: The Whisper cartridge is a lightweight, hyper velocity design using an aluminum core and pre-stressed jacket. The aluminum core initiates the expansion slightly after contact, pressing back into the pre-stressed jacket and activating a violent, incapacitating energy transfer. The cartridge is ideal for close fire contacts of unarmored and/or lightly armored targets. Not to be mistaken for .300 Blackout, since Whisper was developed almost 20 years before it.

61963a852d2c397d660036ad.Name: HK USP Red Dot sight mount
